content:
A personalized paperweight with a motivational quote can be a thoughtful and inspiring gift for an engineering graduate. Here are some quote suggestions that might fit the bill:

1. **"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."** - Steve Jobs
2. **"Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world."** - Albert Einstein
3. **"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall."** - Nelson Mandela
4. **"Innovation is the specific instrument of entrepreneurship. The act that endows resources with a new capacity to create wealth."** - Peter Drucker
5. **"The best way to predict your future is to create it."** - Abraham Lincoln
6. **"Engineering is not just about building things, it's about making a difference."** - Unknown
7. **"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."** - Franklin D. Roosevelt
8. **"Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going."** - Sam Levenson
9. **"The highest form of research is essentially, I think, a form of worship."** - Albert Einstein
10. **"Believe you can and you're halfway there."** - Theodore Roosevelt
11. **"The biggest risk is not taking any risk..."** - Mark Zuckerberg
12. **"The secret of success is constancy to purpose."** - Benjamin Disraeli
13. **"Invention is the master key to progress."** - Charles F. Kettering
14. **"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts."** - Winston Churchill
15. **"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."** - Eleanor Roosevelt

Choose a quote that resonates with your cousin's personality, interests, or goals. You can also consider a quote from a famous engineer or inventor, such as Nikola Tesla, Thomas Edison, or Leonardo da Vinci, to make it more relatable to his field.

Remember to check the length of the quote and the font size to ensure it fits comfortably on the paperweight. You can also add your cousin's name or a personal message to make it an extra-special gift.
